p: In addition, patients treated with IVIg showed a reduction in Th1 cells and low levels of IFNγ and TNFα with the increase of Th2 cytokines such as IL-4 and IL-10 [ 93]. Clinically, it has been demonstrated that patients with Influenza A (H1N1) treated with CP exhibited a reduction of IL-6 and TNFα [ 94], with an increase of IL-10 [ 46]. This support the notion of an anti-inflammatory effect of CP in subjects with acute viral infections.
